evidence.claim: Aquinas / Carondelet adheres to HIPAA compliance, ensuring secure handling of patient data.
The company utilizes FHIR standards for health data exchange, promoting interoperability.
Carondelet Home Health engages in EDI transactions to streamline billing and administrative processes.
Implementation of HL7 messaging standards to improve health information exchange across systems.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in EDI transactions for healthcare, indicating X12 requirement.
